review: I recently had a hysterectomy performed by Dr. Mansi Verma, and I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care I received. From the first consultation, Dr. Verma was professional, compassionate, and attentive, putting me at ease immediately.Dr. Verma thoroughly explained the procedure and addressed all my concerns, ensuring I understood everything. On the day of the surgery, her warm smile and calm demeanor alleviated my anxiety. Her personal touch extended beyond the operating room, with multiple check-ins post-operation to ensure my comfort and understanding of the recovery process.Throughout my recovery, Dr. Verma was accessible and supportive, promptly addressing any questions. Her dedication to patients is evident, and I felt genuinely cared for during the entire experience.Dr. Verma is a highly skilled surgeon and a compassionate healthcare provider. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone in need of gynecological care. She made a significant positive impact on my health and well-being, and I am forever grateful for her expertise and kindness
Extremely helpful doctor, was very patient and supportive.  Would definitely recommend her to family and friends.
She's so sweet...And I m very comfortable with her... always guide me very well.. am blessed that you are my doc! I have great confidence in you and your abilities‚Äù
